settings.title: Maintenance Mode
settings.settings_notice: These settings may not be the current ones. Make sure they are not being overwritten by config.php.
settings.allow_bypass_label: Allow bypass of forum & API maintenance using permission
settings.allow_bypass_hint: Won't bypass if DB is not accessible. Applies to forum & API (unless API is completely disabled through config.php). If disabled, admins will still be able to access API (unless API is completely disabled) to prevent locking yourself out.
settings.prefer_db_hint: Normally, the values in config.php override the ones seen here. Enable this option to make these options override the ones found in the config file - so those are only used in the event that the DB is not accessible.
settings.error_page_file_hint: Path from Flarum root - where vendor and storage are located.
settings.error_page_hint: You can use $app, $translator, $settings, $title, and $message with blade.

permissions.allow_bypass_maintenance_label: Bypass maintenance mode (setting must be enabled)

lib.maintenance_active_message: This forum is currently undergoing maintenance.
lib.maintenance_active_disabled_api_message: The API is currently disabled for everybody.

error.title: Maintenance
error.message: We're currently performing some maintenance. We'll be back online shortly!

error.maintenance_message: The forum is currently in maintenance mode.
